normalized: alighting from a skyscraper in the heart of the city, within the cover of darkness late at night,
uneventfully, i watched the street lights built by human hands and raised my eyes to admire the crescent moon.
from having done that, my mind, heart, and spirit were made calm and steady.
above ground was…unpleasant, too much filth littered this demon capital of tokyo.
the evil spirits of rivers and mountains nested and haunted in tokyo, men's hearts committed crimes and their behavior was too unclean.

name: asagi
normalized: fufu…
perceiving that, i laughed.
in spite of not even having one reason up until now to laugh at throughout accomplishing my mission…
i am a person said to exist, thanks to the people whoshould despise everything that's conspiring, including the evil spirits of rivers and mountains.
the fact that the people are sort of doing it to themselves is a contradiction i found a little amusing.
otherwise, maybe accomplishing the severity of my mission after this would be a little intimidating.

name: asagi
normalized: can i stop thinking so much…because such things don't have an answer
i just need to be composed to accomplish this mission i was given.
people's hearts and the like aren't needed here.
because i am….
on a mission as an anti-demon ninja member.
it is essential that i survive long enough to accomplish my mission…
while seeming to think that, you gently apply your hand to your chest.
thump, thump, thump.
it's all right, always in the same way, my heart minces, beating with accuracy.
i was not shaken confronting this mission.
this mission finishing too, my heartbeat will uneventfully change, it should be so that it varies.

name: asagi
normalized: i should go…
the gust of a lukewarm breeze whirls up, and without change, i jump off, leaving myself from the top of the skyscraper.
the dark existence of the evil spirits of rivers and mountains are encroaching and having an evil influence on the capital of tokyo.
there were said to have been implicit rules in place (mutual non-intervention) that guarded from the demon people in ancient times.
but, a man lapsed into heretical doctrine and tore a seam, conspiring the demon people to form a crime organization and an enterprise via secret maneuvering.
however, stepping up wearing a mantle of righteousness, not everybody was left helpless.
at that time, the government amassed an opposition, organized to repel the evil influence and oppose the wickedness of the demon people’s heretical doctrine.
the neighborhood was quiet, sort of dead.
the heart of the city transforms into a ghost town late at night.
surveying the vicinity nearby, there was not a car in sight, i kept walking.
there was no indication of a presence…however.
it had passed beyond being too unnatural.
perhaps those guys are surrounding the whole area around me.

name: asagi
normalized: （over there too, i should be on alert….
i breathe a big sigh.

name: asagi
normalized: why don't you come out reasonably!?
or is it your method to crawl in groups in the ground like worms?
as long as i'm here when i enter combat, the spacious pathways will never put me at a disadvantage.
i wasn't going to be swallowed up by the world… fighting in this place is only unimaginable.
fufufu, welcome.
so, it's the government dog, anti-demon ninja asagi
in succession, a sign appeared and a voice was heard after.
several hundred ninja crowded around me filling the spacious passages between the buildings, and a woman, holding the personality of their boss, came forth.
but perhaps this woman…

name: asagi
normalized: the oboro forbearance army, you are oboro, the head

name: oboro
normalized: i agree, it seems to appear that way
that is, i exterminate those guys.
i could never let them escape.

name: asagi
normalized: your wickedness has gone too far
oboro sneered lightly at my words.

name: oboro
normalized: kukuku, what are you saying… this isn't a misunderstanding.
the reason is, you did not locate me
her sneer changed into a fascinated, vulgar smile, as oboro gazed at me.

name: oboro
normalized: i lured you out
surely, it's because i let them lure me out.
however, the reason is, i wanted a challenge.
besides, they hadn't realized their self-conceit, thinking they had a chance of winning.

name: asagi
normalized: …you too are a ninja that sympathized with the kako.
i feel it's a good shame that you've sided with the evil spirits of rivers and mountains,

name: oboro
normalized: humph！
haven't you heard the ninja are serving the government!?
are you also saying that the adn is meticulously going to obliterate them one by one?
all ninja's thirst for blood increases, an ordinary person would go mad drinking it, it seems they'd never rid themselves of the trance.
i focused my mind.
i was not bewildered by the number.
i did not avert my increasing thirst for blood.
victory was decided in an instant.

name: oboro
normalized: you've chosen wisely.
i've killed voluptous bodies like yours before….
wouldn't it be better to exhaust your meddling!?
you licked your lips as oboro rolled out her long, narrow, crimson red tongue, similar to that of a snake.
i slowly garnished in my hand my ninja katana.

name: asagi
normalized: is that some sort of joke about me dying?

name: oboro
normalized: i am saying, that asagi is regarded as the best inside the anti-demon ninja.
yet, you too are surrounded by hundreds, you are bluffing
oboro raised her hand, sending a signal to her subordinates.
thereupon, the ninja began composing a sword battle, elminating all hopes of cooperation.

name: asagi
normalized: （as i thought, you practice conflict, it's detestable that you've grown so accustom to murder）
while the target of the sword battle, i instantly understood that it was only the feeling of the body's thirst for blood.
as expected, the multi-national conglomerate body conspired with the evil spirts, with oboro amassing in tokyo, and advancing with the nomads across japan.
that evil influence in the capital tokyo, was the reason i followed up in earnest.
but, that too was until today.
i was going to put an end to this and finish it here.
thus…

name: oboro
normalized: well, what will you do?
i am no oni.
if you throw down your sword here and become a plaything for my subordinates, i'll kill you gently!

name: asagi
normalized: …taste my ninja arts.

name: oboro
normalized: hmph!
what are you saying, with this number of people?!
moron!

name: oboro
normalized: r, ridiculous!

name: asagi
normalized: ninja art・swordplay flower

name: oboro
normalized: this is your ninja art…?!
a wound, to my body…

name: asagi
normalized: in front of me, large numbers are meaningless.
on the contrary, self-conceit invites death.

name: oboro
normalized: i… i will definitely have… revenge…

name: oboro
normalized: i'll remember this… definitely… get you…
i slowly stepped up to oboro.

name: asagi
normalized: aah, remember this
oboro's senses were fading, staring at me and broadly grinning.
seeing the situation, oboro's naiveness still thought the opposite true.
but, that is just futile concerning me now.
swish！
my katana flashed at oboro's head.
from the sense of touching the soft woman flesh, it transmitted through my hands, bisecting hard into her neckbones.
oboro's head fluttered around in the air for an instant, as the peaceful death agony resounded in the heart of the city.

name: asagi
normalized: …my mission, is complete
